title: beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root --ropsten
body:
# ðŸ’Ž Issue
### Background
I used documentation [page](https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/next/install/install-with-docker/#downloading-the-prysm-docker-images) for run beacon node **v2.1.3-rc.3** in docker . 
### Description
I'm trying sync beacon node, for my geth node in the test network` --ropsten`. I only need it so that my geth node gets into the correct chain of blocks after [merge](https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/06/03/ropsten-merge-ttd/).
I'm running beacon node from docker, my docker-compose file:
```
version: '3.9'
services:
  beacon-test-node:
    image: gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain:v2.1.3-rc.3
    hostname: beacon-test-node
    volumes:
      - "/mnt/data0/beacon-test-node/data1:/data"
      - "/mnt/data0/beacon-test-node/genesis1/genesis.ssz:/genesis/genesis.ssz"
    command:
      - --datadir=/data
      - --rpc-host=0.0.0.0
      - --monitoring-host=0.0.0.0
      - --http-web3provider=http://172.16.17.6:8550
      - --genesis-state=/genesis/genesis.ssz
      - --terminal-total-difficulty-override=50000000000000000
      - --ropsten
      - --accept-terms-of-use
    ports:
      - 4000:4000
      - 13000:13000 
      - 12000:12000/udp
```
But I get an error while syncing:

 ```
time="2022-06-14 12:11:04" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 61 starting from  0x8f1a6d3e... 65536/106255 - estimated time remaining 9m46s" blocksPerSecond=69.5 peers=5 prefix=initial-sync
 time="2022-06-14 12:11:04" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x56531606c0bd5a8055c0592c2e6f822bb11e3453c3ab7f44a0e932e76b076117 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=65536)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-06-14 12:11:06" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0x5f121470... 65088/106255 - estimated time remaining 9m52s" blocksPerSecond=69.5 peers=5 prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="could not process block in batch: method not found: received an undefined ee error" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 50 starting from  0x7bc82575... 65152/106255 - estimated time remaining 13m11s" blocksPerSecond=52.0 peers=4 prefix=initial-sync
 time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x7d3303ad6cf3dfbf55394fd50789a1616af25187984d3d56fd4fafc2f02694da (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=65152)" prefix=initial-sync

 time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 57 starting from  0x67aba47f... 65280/106255 - estimated time remaining 11m55s" blocksPerSecond=57.2 peers=4 prefix=initial-sync
 time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xd99d8bd1860c47a1995458e09fa422ef7c42fed66575da26c17963e3d99af2e3 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=65280)" prefix=initial-sync

 time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xc374da4e750236af42eb4976412bfc1f96cbed3f07eac1938c42233c97c8442d (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=65408)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0x19d6d017... 65472/106255 - estimated time remaining 10m14s" blocksPerSecond=66.4 peers=4 prefix=initial-sync
 time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0xedacd662531617166bc7f0480812010c258d411b8bba2d359310276ec9b7adc7 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=65472)" prefix=initial-sync
time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=info msg="Processing block batch of size 61 starting from  0x8f1a6d3e... 65536/106255 - estimated time remaining 9m46s" blocksPerSecond=69.5 peers=4 prefix=initial-sync
 time="2022-06-14 12:11:09" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x56531606c0bd5a8055c0592c2e6f822bb11e3453c3ab7f44a0e932e76b076117 (in processBatchedBlocks, slot=65536)" prefix=initial-sync
 time="2022-06-14 12:11:10" level=info msg="Connected to new endpoint: http://172.16.17.6:8550" prefix=powchain

```
Please tell me what I'm doing wrong??

Hi, I have the same problem on Sepolia testnet.

Sepolia, v2.1.4-rc-1 and 2.1.3. Stack with initial sync.
``
./beacon-chain --sepolia --datadir='./prysm_data' --http-web3provider='http://0.0.0.0:8553' --jwt-secret=/mnt/md2/erigon-sepolia/erigon/chaindata/jwt.hex --rpc-host=0.0.0.0 --rpc-port=4000 --monitoring-host=0.0.0.0 --genesis-state=genesis.ssz --terminal-total-difficulty-override 17000000000000000 --accept-terms-of-use
``

@potuz @terencechain 
```
time="2022-08-09 09:09:40" level=warning msg="Batch is not processed" error="could not process block in batch: could not set node to invalid: invalid nil or unknown node" prefix=initial-sync
```

Is this a new issue, or something resolved in develop ?
@barwod You need to use the engine port in geth and connect prysm to that (8551 instead of 8545)
@artjoma Can you link your ee(erigon)  logs in this time period too ? It seems related

@nisdas 
Right now I updated Erigon to 2022.08.01(last stable version). Problem not solved.
